urls.description: The Wildlife Trusts are delighted to be bringing you a very special Wild LIVE during which Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, George...

text: This speech by @MPGeorgeEustice is worth a listen - he's doing more than I was aware of, but the key thing to me is that he wants @NaturalEngland  (& hopefully the @EnvAgency) to become less process-driven & focus more on outcomes. https://t.co/S49TgSO4EX

We have launched a public petition calling on Government to give the @EnvAgency the mandate and resources to do a proper job. Rivers need your support. Please sign, and share as widely as you can, our petition. In doing so you are #standingupforrivers https://t.co/MpBqnclqe3
